basics.name: Ibrahim Matar
basics.label: Engineer
basics.summary: I am Ibrahim Matar, a Computer Engineer with a proven track record in cybersecurity and software development. Skilled in Python, Java, C, and web technologies, I apply my technical expertise to deliver impactful solutions and real-world results.

highlights: Increased monthly sales 134% by recommending  seasonal buy one get one sales,and rebates.
Trained team members in successful strategies to meet operational and sales targets.
Monitored business levels and realigned team positions to provide optimal coverage for customer demands.
Estimated supply requirements based on historical needs and projected business levels by accounting for special local events or sports games.

Identified, investigated and corrected operational issues such as inventory waste or theft to keep business operating at optimal levels. Managed inventory records and supply orders to cut costs by 12%.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii - College of Engineering
awards.summary: Awarded to undergraduate students who ended the Spring 2023 semester with a GPA of at least 3.5.

awards.title: Vice President
awards.summary: The elected vice president of class 2021
